summary: Lane A complete: CoherenceProvider callback added to PhiIR Evaluator with default mathematical fallback preserved, CoherenceCheck now resolves through provider injection, and src/sensors.rs now uses real sysinfo CPU/memory telemetry (mock removed) with main_cli wiring and examples/healing_bed.phi verified.

verification.fail_first: cargo test --test phi_ir_evaluator_tests test_coherence_keyword_accepts_injected_value => error[E0425]: cannot find function evaluate_with_coherence in this scope
verification.targeted_after_fix: cargo test --test phi_ir_evaluator_tests test_coherence_keyword_accepts_injected_value => test result: ok. 1 passed; 0 failed
verification.full_cargo_suite: cargo test aggregate summaries => PASSED=213, FAILED=0
verification.healing_bed_runtime: Run1: Resonating Field 0.9801Hz; Run2: Resonating Field 0.9800Hz (same binary, separate executions). Values are live sensor-derived and not fixed at 0.6180.
verification.ritual: python3 QSOP/tools/run_all.py --pending-ack-sla-hours 24 --in-progress-sla-hours 24 (re-run after this ACK schema fix)

notes: CoherenceProvider is optional and defaults to prior compute_coherence() semantics, preserving existing evaluator tests.
sysinfo crate integrated at version 0.30.x; CPU usage read via global_cpu_info().cpu_usage().
